explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: none
exception_handling: retained the existing try-catch structure with generic Exception handling and stack trace printing, matching the style used in the decrypt method
logic_customization: replaced hardcoded "UTF-8" charset usage with Constants.BASE_ENCODING for IV and key byte conversions; encryption algorithm, cipher initialization, and Base64 encoding logic remain unchanged; used org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Base64.encodeBase64String as in the project
refactoring: renamed parameters to key1 and iv1 to align with project conventions and updated all internal references accordingly
misc: removed the System.out.println that logged the Base64-encrypted output to suppress console logging as requested; no new custom API calls introduced
